content: rbg s favorite collar this pattern is a simplified crocheted interpretation of supreme court justice ruth bader ginsburg s favorite collar yarn weight super fine i used loops & threads woolike hook size 2 25 mm b abbreviations chain chain single_crochet single_crochet tip before starting leave a long starting tail to use as part of the tie for the collar chain a multiple of 3 + 1 note the starting chain length will vary depending on your desired collar size for some guidance 136 chains results in a collar size of about 16 5 for the finished piece while 160 chains is close to 20 this may vary depending on your own gauge yarn etc r1 ​single_crochet in second chain from hook single_crochet until end chain 1 turn r2 ​ chain 5 skip 2 single_crochet repeat until end ch1 turn r3-r6 ​ chain 5 single_crochet into chain space repeat until end ch1 turn r7 ​ ch5 single_crochet in second chain from hook single_crochet again chain 2 single_crochet into chain space repeat until end fasten_off and weave in end finishing at the start of r1 where there isn t the starting tail attach a string of yarn to create the second half of the tie for the collar updated september 20 2020
